name: Allosaurus Brain
description: Brain harvested from Allosaurus; part of boss offering materials.

name: Argentavis Talon
description: Crafted resource from harvesting an Argentavis; used in boss offerings.

name: Basilosaurus Blubber
description: Oil-rich blubber from Basilosaurus; high-tier tribute resource.

name: Black Pearl
description: A rare resource used in high-end crafting recipes, particularly for Tek items.

name: Chibi
description: Cosmetic pet that follows players around. Can boost max survivor level when leveled.

name: Electrical Generator
description: Converts fuel into electricity to power nearby structures.

name: 100 x Electronics
description: Crafted from silica pearls and metal ingots. Required in advanced electrical crafting.

name: Extraordinary Kibble
description: Top-tier kibble used for taming the most advanced and choosy creatures.

name: 100 x Fertilizer
description: High-quality fertilizer made in a compost bin or dung beetle. Used to grow crops in crop plots.

name: 100 x Gasoline
description: Crafted from oil and hide in a forge. Used to fuel electrical structures and vehicles.

name: Giganotosaurus Heart
description: Heart from Giganotosaurus; used in end-game boss tributes.

name: Industrial Cooker
description: An upgraded cooking pot with faster cooking speed and more inventory slots.

name: Industrial Forge
description: High-capacity forge for smelting metal and other resources faster than the primitive forge.

name: Industrial Grill
description: A refined cooking station that cooks food and preserves it longer with fuel and ingredients.

name: Industrial Grinder
description: Mechanical grinder that converts corpses and items into useful resources.

name: Large Elevator Platform
description: A large mechanical platform that allows vertical transport of structures and creatures.

name: Loadout Mannequin
description: Allows players to save and equip gear loadouts instantly.

name: Medical Brew
description: Instant healing tonic that restores health and cures bleeding.

name: Megalania Toxin
description: Toxic gland harvested from a Megalania; used in boss offerings.

name: Megalodon Tooth
description: Rare tooth from a Megalodon; used for advanced boss tributes.

name: 100 x Metal Ingot
description: Created by refining metal ore in a forge. Used in many mid- to late-game crafting recipes.

name: Metal Tree Platform
description: Robust tree platform constructed from metal for advanced elevated bases.

name: Mindwipe Tonic
description: Resets all engram points and stats. Allows complete redistribution of a survivor’s build.

name: Motorboat
description: A gasoline-powered watercraft capable of supporting structures and offering fast aquatic travel.

name: Polymer
description: A synthetic material used in advanced crafting recipes like weapons and armor.

name: Pump-Action Shotgun
description: A powerful close-range firearm with slow pump-action fire rate.

name: Riot Boots
description: Armor boots offering strong protection for the feet in combat.

name: Riot Chestpiece
description: Durable riot armor chestplate with excellent damage resistance.

name: Riot Gauntlets
description: Protective riot gloves that reduce melee damage to the hands.

name: Riot Helmet
description: Enclosed riot helmet providing solid head protection and visor.

name: Riot Leggings
description: Heavy armor leggings that provide high protection against damage.

name: Rock Elemental Saddle
description: A specialized saddle crafted for riding and controlling Rock Elementals. Designed with reinforced materials to handle the immense weight and power of the creature, providing both stability and protection to the rider.

name: Rock Drake Saddle
description: Allows players to ride and control a Rock Drake, a creature with unique gliding and climbing abilities.

name: Sarcosuchus Skin
description: Tough skin from Sarcosuchus; used in tribute items.

name: Sauropod Vertebra
description: Massive vertebrae from a sauropod; used in high-value tributes.

name: Simple Shotgun Ammo
description: Standard shells for shotguns; reliable and easy to craft.

name: Skin
description: Any costumes or outfits for yourself or for your dino.

name: Snow Owl Saddle
description: A lightweight, aerodynamic saddle designed for the Snow Owl, offering the rider comfort and maneuverability while enabling the creature’s swift aerial movements and unique healing abilities.

name: Spinosaurus Sail
description: Dorsal sail harvested from Spinosaurus; valuable in boss tributes.

name: Taxidermy
description: Used to capture the Dermis of a dead creature.

name: Taxidermy Base
description: Is a structure used to display harvested creature dermises (skins).

name: Therizino Claws
description: Claws harvested from Therizinosaurus; used in boss tributes.

name: Thylacoleo Hook-Claw
description: Hook-claw obtained from Thylacoleo; used for high-tier tributes.

name: Titanoboa Venom
description: Venom from a Titanoboa; used as tribute or in crafting.

name: Titanosaur Platform Saddle
description: Massive saddle that converts a Titanosaur into a mobile building platform.

name: Tusoteuthis Tentacle
description: Tentacle harvested from Tusoteuthis; tribute or crafting component.

name: Tyrannosaurus Arm
description: Powerful limb of a Tyrannosaurus; used as tribute material.

name: Wind Turbine
description: Generates electricity from wind power. More efficient at higher elevations.

name: Wood Tree Platform
description: A platform that can be placed on trees for defensive or elevated building.

name: Yutyrannus Lungs
description: Large lungs from Yutyrannus; used in elite tributes.

name: Deinonychus Saddle
description: A specialized saddle for riding a Deinonychus, offering improved control and protection.

name: Gacha Saddle
description: A crafted saddle that allows riding and better control of a Gacha.

name: Megatherium Saddle
description: A saddle designed for the Megatherium, useful in chitin farming expeditions.

name: Managarmr Saddle
description: A frost-resistant saddle for riding the agile Managarmr.

name: Rock Golem Saddle
description: A saddle for the Rock Elemental (Rock Golem), enabling survivors to ride and control this powerful siege creature on Scorched Earth.

name: Mantis Saddle
description: A saddle for the Mantis, a versatile creature that can wield melee weapons and tools when equipped.

name: Rhyniognatha Saddle
description: A saddle that lets survivors ride the Rhyniognatha and utilize its resin abilities and aerial strength.
